name: Battered Straw Hat
data: It increases the users strength poorly.
It increases the users dexterity a tiny bit.
It increases the users constitution poorly.
It decreases the users wisdom an average amount.
It decreases the users intelligence noticably.
It has excellent armour class for its type (feeble in general).
It increases the users hitpoint regeneration a bit.
This item loses its magical powers with average speed.
It decreases the users fire resistance strongly.
